text: Phase 14.1 federates local+cloud+legacy into SOT. Deliverables: rag_index_federation.zsh, rag_unification.yaml, manifest.json. Result: unified index created.
Phase 14.2 defines canonical telemetry schema and tools/telemetry_sync.zsh to normalize events (rag.ctx.*, rag.probe.*, bridge.sync.*).
Phase 14.3 bridges unified knowledge to MCP Memory/Search with idempotent batching and LaunchAgent scheduling.
Phase 14.4 implements RAG-driven contextual responses with telemetry coverage and probe hit-rate/latency metrics.
